name: Interface ConditionalExpressionTree
text:
A tree node for the conditional operator ? :.

 For example:
 
   condition ? trueExpression : falseExpression
codes:
@Deprecated(since="11",
            forRemoval=true)
public interface ConditionalExpressionTree
extends ExpressionTree

methods.description: Returns the condition expression of this ternary expression.
Returns the true part of this ternary expression.
Returns the false part of this ternary expression.
